title: Week 20 Liquidity Mining Proposal
body:
This marks the 20th week of liquidity mining on Balancer v2. The Ballers propose the following changes which will go into effect 00:00 UTC Monday, October 4th, 2021. 

Following the proposal ( https://snapshot.org/#/balancer.eth/proposal/QmQiatrqfsNZ4eSPCwBwaujBujwzhu2QqHEBSHqEoXs8g5 ) to move from tiers to fully flexible BAL on Polygon passing, the liquidity mining committee can now make more granular changes on Polygon. 

## ETHEREUM POOLS

There are no proposed changes this week.

## POLYGON POOLS

* Reduce USDC/WETH/BAL/MATIC from 7,500 BAL/week to 6,500 BAL/week.
* Reduce USDC/WETH/LINK/BAL/AAVE from 5,000 BAL/week to 4,500 BAL/week.
* Reduce USDC/WETH/WBTC from 2,500 BAL/week to 2,250 BAL/week.
* Reduce WETH/LINK/BAL/AAVE from 2,500 BAL/week to 2,250 BAL/week.
* Reduce WMATIC/MTA/WETH from 1,000 BAL/week to 450 BAL/week.
* Reduce USDC/WETH/SNX/GRT from 1,000 BAL/week to 750 BAL/week.
* Reduce QI/WMATIC/USDC/MAI/BAL from 1,000 BAL/week to 300 BAL/week.
* Allocate 500 BAL/week & 750,000 TEL/week to TEL/BAL - 50/50.
* Allocate 500 BAL/week & 750,000 TEL/week to TEL/BAL/USDC - 60/20/20.
* Allocate 1,250 BAL/week to WBTC/WETH 50/50.
* Allocate 1,250 BAL/week to USDC/WETH 50/50.

## ARBITRUM POOLS
There are no proposed changes this week.

Link to pull request: https://github.com/balancer-labs/frontend-v2/pull/908
author: 0x176001586fF17ad625Dc387557631710cf485f72
